welcome_message_body: Welcome to Norcross, where southern hospitality meets small-town charm! Explore our historic downtown, known for its charming shops and restaurants, and discover the hidden gems of our city. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Norcross.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private aviation and offers a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gwinnett County Airport is a modern and spacious building, offering all necessary amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Gwinnett County Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport offers services for private and charter flights.

terminals.name: Hangar Terminal
terminals.description: The hangar terminal at College Park Airport is used for aircraft storage and maintenance.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport houses the majority of the airport's facilities, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves as the gateway for all international flights. It features a wide range of amenities, including duty-free shopping and dining options.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal North
terminals.description: The domestic terminal north at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport is home to many of the airport's major airlines, as well as a variety of shops and eateries.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal South
terminals.description: The domestic terminal south at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves as the hub for Delta Air Lines, the airport's largest carrier. It also offers a variety of dining and shopping options for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Winder Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Winder Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Canton Cherokee County Regional Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Canton Cherokee County Regional Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
